alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 12:01PM PST until February 02 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...In Nevada, Southern Clark County including Searchlight. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin and Cadiz Basin. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects or temporary structures. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few brief power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust could result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin
